word:
(217)                           Sanitarium, National City, Calif. P-265-1905.                     Sept. 14, 1905. 

Dear Sister Peek: 
     During our conversation this morning, I felt greatly perplexed to know what to say in reference to your work. I love you, and I want to see you in a position where you can best serve the Master. 


                         -129-
